titleStmt.title: The skirmisher defeated and truth defended being an answer to a pamphlet, entituled, A skirmish made upon Quakerism / by William Penn.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: A Skirmish made upon Quakerism / [by John Cheyney]. London, 1676.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
